document_data.mainbody:
he Hunters Blades Trilogy Collectors Edition is an omnibus of The Hunters Blades trilogy, R. A. Salvatores fifth novel trilogy about the drow hero Drizzt DoUrden. The hardcover edition was published in January 2007. The books are also available collected as The Hunters Blades Trilogy Gift Set.
Hunters Blades Trilogy Collectors Edition
